properties.short description: Tancred is Made Ruler of Acerenza
properties.description: The city of Acerenza removed their leader and sought Tancred to rule them instead so as to avoid rule under Roger II.
properties.source: The History of the Most Serene Roger, First King of Sicily in Roger II and the Creation of the Kingdom of Siclly, trans. and ed. Graham A. Loud (Manchester, Eng. and New York: Manchester University Press, 2012).

properties.short description: S. Agata Given to Roger II
properties.description: In exhange for a new city, Richard son of Hoel gave S. Agata to Roger II.
properties.people:
Roger II, King
Richard son of Hoel
properties.source: The History of the Most Serene Roger, First King of Sicily in Roger II and the Creation of the Kingdom of Siclly, trans. and ed. Graham A. Loud (Manchester, Eng. and New York: Manchester University Press, 2012).

properties.description: A man named William was elected by the local clergy to Archbishop.
properties.source: The History of the Most Serene Roger, First King of Sicily in Roger II and the Creation of the Kingdom of Siclly, trans. and ed. Graham A. Loud (Manchester, Eng. and New York: Manchester University Press, 2012).
